data.name: Provider1
data.value: Each Host Company should read these terms carefully before participating in the program "Atlas - Central System Support Internships Students Universities". The participation of each Host Company in the "Atlas" implies explicit and unconditional acceptance of these terms.

data.name: Provider2
data.value: The participant Host Company in the "Atlas" declares and accepts expressly and without reservation, that every activity of the Information System Project will obey these terms and conditions and the applicable law.

data.name: Provider3
data.value: Host Company’s Participation Certificate signed by the legal representative of FYPA when registering in the "Atlas" Solemn Declaration lieu of Law 1599/1986.

data.name: Provider4
data.value: With Host Company’s Participation Certificate, participant FYPA authorizes legally a natural person who becomes responsible for the "Atlas", which automatically accepts the terms and conditions for the participation in the Program and is required to comply with them. Any act or omission by the authorized contact person is considered an act or omission of Host Company.

data.name: Provider5
data.value: The participant is required to FYPA accepts and assumes any claim raised by GRNET and exempt AboutGRNETS.A SA and their directors , officers , employees, partners and agents from any liability for damages, expenses ( including legal fees) , judgments and any other costs or claims by third parties that may result from violations of the current legislation , when entering the position practice exercise in the Information System project and / or dealt with by the students.

data.name: Provider6
data.value: The participant Host Company explicitly and honor that every item record is accurate and true. The participant Host Company is the only responsible to update the registered details in case of any change.

data.name: Provider7
data.value: The management and protection of personal data of the participant Host Company subject to these terms and the relevant provisions of Greek and European law for the general protection of individuals with regard to processing of personal data and privacy of communications, as interpreted by decisions of competent independent Administrative Authorities. In any case GRNET reserves the right to change the terms of protection of personal data on information of participants Host Company through this website . The GRNETis not involved in any way in any dispute which may arise between third natural or legal persons involved in the ""ATLAS"" .

data.name: Provider8
data.value: Participation in the program involves the explicit and unconditional consent of Host Company for registering their personal details in a file that is kept by them and for the modification of them by GRNET SA. in the implementation of this project in accordance with the provisions of N.2472/1997 as applicable. So GRNET may use personal information to communicate with participants Host Company and information on issues related to the project. The GRNET safeguards the personal nature of the information reported by the participant Host Companies and may not be transferred without their consent to any third party (natural or legal) for any reason , with the exception of the relevant provisions of law and the relevant authorities .

data.name: Provider9
data.value: GRNET may amend / update these terms without any prior notice. For this reason, whenever possible usage of the online service 'Atlas' takes place, every user must check the applicable terms of use, since participation in the 'Atlas' implies explicit and unconditional acceptance of these terms.

Otherwise you can contact the “ATLAS” helpdesk at +0030-215 215 7860.
